android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.name: android.permission-group.COST_MONEY
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.description: Do things that can cost you money.
android.permission-group.COST_MONEY.label: Services that cost you money

android.permission-group.MESSAGES.name: android.permission-group.MESSAGES
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.description: Read and write your SMS, email, and other messages.
android.permission-group.MESSAGES.label: Your messages

android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.name: android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO
android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.description: Direct access to information about your contacts and social connections.
android.permission-group.SOCIAL_INFO.label: Your social information

android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.name: android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.description: Direct access to information about you, stored in on your contact card.
android.permission-group.PERSONAL_INFO.label: Your personal information

android.permission-group.CALENDAR.name: android.permission-group.CALENDAR
android.permission-group.CALENDAR.description: Direct access to calendar and events.
android.permission-group.CALENDAR.label: Calendar

android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.name: android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.description: Add words to the user dictionary.
android.permission-group.WRITE_USER_DICT.label: Write User Dictionary

android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.name: android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS
android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.description: Direct access to bookmarks and browser history.
android.permission-group.BOOKMARKS.label: Bookmarks and History

android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.name: android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_FEATURES
android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.description: Features that assistive technology can request.
android.permission-group.ACCESSIBILITY_F.label: Accessibility features

android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.name: android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWORK
android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.description: Access devices and networks through Bluetooth.
android.permission-group.BLUETOOTH_NETWO.label: Bluetooth

android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.name: android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY
android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.description: Use features that can quickly drain battery.
android.permission-group.AFFECTS_BATTERY.label: Affects Battery

android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.name: android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTROLS
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.description: Direct access to hardware on the handset.
android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTRO.label: Hardware controls

android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.name: android.permission-group.MICROPHONE
android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.description: Direct access to the microphone to record audio.
android.permission-group.MICROPHONE.label: Microphone

android.permission-group.CAMERA.name: android.permission-group.CAMERA
android.permission-group.CAMERA.description: Direct access to camera for image or video capture.
android.permission-group.CAMERA.label: Camera

android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.name: android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.description: Monitor, record, and process phone calls.
android.permission-group.PHONE_CALLS.label: Phone calls

android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.name: android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK
android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.description: Ability to affect behavior of the lock screen on your device.
android.permission-group.SCREENLOCK.label: Lock screen

android.permission-group.APP_INFO.name: android.permission-group.APP_INFO
android.permission-group.APP_INFO.description: Ability to affect behavior of other applications on your device.
android.permission-group.APP_INFO.label: Your applications information

android.permission-group.DISPLAY.name: android.permission-group.DISPLAY
android.permission-group.DISPLAY.description: Effect the UI of other applications.
android.permission-group.DISPLAY.label: Other Application UI

android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.name: android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.description: Change the device time or timezone.
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_CLOCK.label: Clock

android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR
android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.description: Change the device status bar settings.
android.permission-group.STATUS_BAR.label: Status Bar

android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.name: android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.description: Lower-level access and control of the system.
android.permission-group.SYSTEM_TOOLS.label: System tools

android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.name: android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOOLS
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.description: Features only needed for app developers.
android.permission-group.DEVELOPMENT_TOO.label: Development tools

android.permission.SEND_SMS.name: android.permission.SEND_SMS
android.permission.SEND_SMS.description:
Allows the app to send SMS messages.
     This may result in unexpected charges. Malicious apps may cost you money by
     sending messages without your confirmation.
android.permission.SEND_SMS.label: send SMS messages

android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.name: android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE
android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.description:
Allows the app to send
      requests to other messaging apps to handle respond-via-message events for incoming
      calls.
android.permission.SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESS.label: send respond-via-message events

android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.description:
Allows the app to receive and process SMS
      messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your
      device without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS.label: receive text messages (SMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.description:
Allows the app to receive and process MMS
      messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your
      device without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_MMS.label: receive text messages (MMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BROADCAST
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.description:
Allows the app to receive
      and process emergency broadcast messages. This permission is only available
      to system apps.
android.permission.RECEIVE_EMERGENCY_BRO.label: receive emergency broadcasts

android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.name: android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS
android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.description:
Allows the app to read
      cell broadcast messages received by your device. Cell broadcast alerts
      are delivered in some locations to warn you of emergency situations.
      Malicious apps may interfere with the performance or operation of your
      device when an emergency cell broadcast is received.
android.permission.READ_CELL_BROADCASTS.label: read cell broadcast messages

android.permission.READ_SMS.name: android.permission.READ_SMS
android.permission.READ_SMS.description:
Allows the app to read SMS
      messages stored on your phone or SIM card. This allows the app to read all
      SMS messages, regardless of content or confidentiality.
android.permission.READ_SMS.label: read your text messages (SMS or MMS)

android.permission.WRITE_SMS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SMS
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.description:
Allows the app to write
      to SMS messages stored on your phone or SIM card. Malicious apps
      may delete your messages.
android.permission.WRITE_SMS.label: edit your text messages (SMS or MMS)

android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.description:
Allows the app to receive and process
     WAP messages.  This permission includes the ability to monitor or delete
     messages sent to you without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH.label: receive text messages (WAP)

android.permission.RECEIVE_BLUETOOTH_MAP.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BLUETOOTH_MAP
android.permission.RECEIVE_BLUETOOTH_MAP.description:
Allows the app to receive and process Bluetooth MAP
      messages. This means the app could monitor or delete messages sent to your
      device without showing them to you.
android.permission.RECEIVE_BLUETOOTH_MAP.label: receive Bluetooth messages (MAP)

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.READ_CONTACTS
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.description:
Allows the app to
      read data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the
      frequency with which you\'ve called, emailed, or communicated in other ways
      with specific individuals. This permission allows apps to save your
      contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your
      knowledge.
android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.label: read your contacts

android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.name: android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.description:
Allows the app to
    modify the data about your contacts stored on your phone, including the
    frequency with which you\'ve called, emailed, or communicated in other ways
    with specific contacts. This permission allows apps to delete contact
    data.
android.permission.WRITE_CONTACTS.label: modify your contacts

android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.name: android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG
android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.description:
Allows the app to read
      your phone\'s call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls.
      This permission allows apps to save your call log data, and malicious apps
      may share call log data without your knowledge.
android.permission.READ_CALL_LOG.label: read call log

android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.name: android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.description:
Allows the app to modify your phone\'s call log, including data about incoming and outgoing calls.
        Malicious apps may use this to erase or modify your call log.
android.permission.WRITE_CALL_LOG.label: write call log

android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.description:
Allows the app
      to access and sync social updates from you and your friends. Be careful
      when sharing information -- this allows the app to read communications
      between you and your friends on social networks, regardless of
      confidentiality. Note: this permission may not be enforced on all social
      networks.
android.permission.READ_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: read your social stream

android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.name: android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.description:
Allows the app to
     display social updates from your friends.  Be careful when sharing
     information -- this allows the app to produce messages that may appear to
     come from a friend. Note: this permission may not be enforced on all social
     networks.
android.permission.WRITE_SOCIAL_STREAM.label: write to your social stream

android.permission.READ_PROFILE.name: android.permission.READ_PROFILE
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.description:
Allows the app to read
     personal profile information stored on your device, such as your name and
     contact information. This means the app can identify you and may send your
     profile information to others.
android.permission.READ_PROFILE.label: read your own contact card

android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.name: android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.description:
Allows the app to
      change or add to personal profile information stored on your device, such
      as your name and contact information.  This means the app can identify you
      and may send your profile information to others.
android.permission.WRITE_PROFILE.label: modify your own contact card

android.permission.BODY_SENSORS.name: android.permission.BODY_SENSORS
android.permission.BODY_SENSORS.description:
Allows the app to access data from sensors
    that monitor your physical condition, such as your heart rate.
android.permission.BODY_SENSORS.label: body sensors (like heart rate monitors)

android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.READ_CALENDAR
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.description:
Allows the app to
       read all calendar events stored on your phone, including those of friends
       or co-workers. This may allow the app to share or save your calendar data,
       regardless of confidentiality or sensitivity.
android.permission.READ_CALENDAR.label: read calendar events plus confidential information

android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.name: android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.description:
Allows the app to
        add, remove, change events that you can modify on your phone, including
        those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to send messages
        that appear to come from calendar owners, or modify events without the
        owners\' knowledge.
android.permission.WRITE_CALENDAR.label: add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owners\' knowledge

android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.description:
Allows the app to read all words,
       names and phrases that the user may have stored in the user dictionary.
android.permission.READ_USER_DICTIONARY.label: read terms you added to the dictionary

android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.name: android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.description:
Allows the app to write new words into the
      user dictionary.
android.permission.WRITE_USER_DICTIONARY.label: add words to user-defined dictionary

com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.name: com.android.browser.permission.READ_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.description:
Allows the app to read the
     history of all URLs that the Browser has visited, and all of the Browser\'s
     bookmarks. Note: this permission may not be enforced by third-party
     browsers or other  applications with web browsing capabilities.
com.android.browser.permission.READ_HIST.label: read your Web bookmarks and history

com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.name: com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HISTORY_BOOKMARKS
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.description:
Allows the
        app to modify the Browser\'s history or bookmarks stored on your phone.
        This may allow the app to erase or modify Browser data.  Note:
        this permission may note be enforced by third-party browsers or other
        applications with web browsing capabilities.
com.android.browser.permission.WRITE_HIS.label: write web bookmarks and history

com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.name: com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.description:
Allows the app to set an alarm in
      an installed alarm clock app. Some alarm clock apps may
      not implement this feature.
com.android.alarm.permission.SET_ALARM.label: set an alarm

com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.name: com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOICEMAIL
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.description:
Allows the app to add messages
      to your voicemail inbox.
com.android.voicemail.permission.ADD_VOI.label: add voicemail

com.android.voicemail.permission.WRITE_V.name: com.android.voicemail.permission.WRITE_VOICEMAIL
com.android.voicemail.permission.WRITE_V.description: Allows the app to modify and remove messages from your voicemail inbox.
com.android.voicemail.permission.WRITE_V.label: write voicemails

com.android.voicemail.permission.READ_VO.name: com.android.voicemail.permission.READ_VOICEMAIL
com.android.voicemail.permission.READ_VO.description: Allows the app to read your voicemails.
com.android.voicemail.permission.READ_VO.label: read voicemail

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description:
Allows the app to get your
      precise location using the Global Positioning System (GPS) or network
      location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location services
      must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them.
      Apps may use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional
      battery power.
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.label:
precise location (GPS and
      network-based)

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.name: android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.description:
Allows the app to get your
      approximate location. This location is derived by location services using
      network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location
      services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to
      use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you
      are.
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.label:
approximate location
      (network-based)

android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.description:
Create mock location sources for
      testing or install a new location provider.  This allows the app to
      override the location and/or status returned by other location sources
      such as GPS or location providers.
android.permission.ACCESS_MOCK_LOCATION.label: mock location sources for testing

android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.name: android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.description:
Allows the app to access
      extra location provider commands.  This may allow the app to interfere
      with the operation of the GPS or other location sources.
android.permission.ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA.label: access extra location provider commands

android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.name: android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.description:
Create mock location sources
      for testing or install a new location provider.  This allows the app to
      override the location and/or status returned by other location sources
      such as GPS or location providers.
android.permission.INSTALL_LOCATION_PROV.label: permission to install a location provider

android.permission.INTERNET.name: android.permission.INTERNET
android.permission.INTERNET.description:
Allows the app to create
     network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other
     applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this
     permission is not required to send data to the internet.
android.permission.INTERNET.label: full network access

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description:
Allows the app to view
      information about network connections such as which networks exist and are
      connected.
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.label: view network connections

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description:
Allows the app to view information
      about Wi-Fi networking, such as whether Wi-Fi is enabled and name of
      connected Wi-Fi devices.
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.label: view Wi-Fi connections

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.description:
Allows the app to connect to and
      disconnect from Wi-Fi access points and to make changes to device
      configuration for Wi-Fi networks.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE.label: connect and disconnect from Wi-Fi

android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE
android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.description:
Allows the app to determine whether
     WiMAX is enabled and information about any WiMAX networks that are
     connected.
android.permission.ACCESS_WIMAX_STATE.label: connect and disconnect from WiMAX

android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.description:
Allows the app to
      connect the phone to and disconnect the phone from WiMAX networks.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIMAX_STATE.label: Change WiMAX state

android.permission.SCORE_NETWORKS.name: android.permission.SCORE_NETWORKS
android.permission.SCORE_NETWORKS.description:
Allows the app to
        rank networks and influence which networks the phone should prefer.
android.permission.SCORE_NETWORKS.label: score networks

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description:
Allows the app to view the
      configuration of the Bluetooth on the phone, and to make and accept
      connections with paired devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH.label: pair with Bluetooth devices

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.description:
Allows the app to configure
      the local Bluetooth phone, and to discover and pair with remote devices.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_ADMIN.label: access Bluetooth settings

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.description:
Allows the app to
      pair with remote devices without user interaction.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED.label: allow Bluetooth pairing by Application

android.permission.BLUETOOTH_MAP.name: android.permission.BLUETOOTH_MAP
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_MAP.description: Allows the app to access Bluetooth MAP data.
android.permission.BLUETOOTH_MAP.label: access Bluetooth MAP data

android.permission.NFC.name: android.permission.NFC
android.permission.NFC.description:
Allows the app to communicate
      with Near Field Communication (NFC) tags, cards, and readers.
android.permission.NFC.label: control Near Field Communication

android.permission.NFC_HANDOVER_STATUS.name: android.permission.NFC_HANDOVER_STATUS
android.permission.NFC_HANDOVER_STATUS.description: Allows this application to receive information about current Android Beam transfers
android.permission.NFC_HANDOVER_STATUS.label: Receive Android Beam transfer status

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows the app to get
      the list of accounts known by the phone.  This may include any accounts
      created by applications you have installed.
android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.label: find accounts on the device

android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows the app
    to use the account authenticator capabilities of the
    AccountManager, including creating accounts and getting and
    setting their passwords.
android.permission.AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS.label: create accounts and set passwords

android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.name: android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.description: Allows the app to request authentication tokens.
android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS.label: use accounts on the device

android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.description:
Allows the app to
    perform operations like adding and removing accounts, and deleting
    their password.
android.permission.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS.label: add or remove accounts

android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.name: android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.description: Allows the app to make calls to AccountAuthenticators.
android.permission.ACCOUNT_MANAGER.label: act as the AccountManagerService

android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.name: android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.description:
Allows the app to receive
      packets sent to all devices on a Wi-Fi network using multicast addresses,
      not just your phone.  It uses more power than the non-multicast mode.
android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST.label: allow Wi-Fi Multicast reception

android.permission.VIBRATE.name: android.permission.VIBRATE
android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the app to control the vibrator.
android.permission.VIBRATE.label: control vibration

android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.name: android.permission.FLASHLIGHT
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.description: Allows the app to control the flashlight.
android.permission.FLASHLIGHT.label: control flashlight

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.name: android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.label: prevent phone from sleeping

android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR.name: android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR
android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR.description: Allows the app to use the phone\'s infrared transmitter.
android.permission.TRANSMIT_IR.label: transmit infrared

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to modify global audio settings such as volume and which speaker is used for output.
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.label: change your audio settings

android.permission.MANAGE_USB.name: android.permission.MANAGE_USB
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.description: Allows the app to manage preferences and permissions for USB devices.
android.permission.MANAGE_USB.label: manage preferences and permissions for USB devices

android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.name: android.permission.ACCESS_MTP
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.description: Allows access to the kernel MTP driver to implement the MTP USB protocol.
android.permission.ACCESS_MTP.label: implement MTP protocol

android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.name: android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.description:
Allows the app to control
        various peripherals for the purpose of hardware testing.
android.permission.HARDWARE_TEST.label: test hardware

android.permission.ACCESS_FM_RADIO.name: android.permission.ACCESS_FM_RADIO
android.permission.ACCESS_FM_RADIO.description: Allows the app to access FM radio to listen to programs.
android.permission.ACCESS_FM_RADIO.label: access FM radio

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.name: android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description:
Allows the app to record audio with the
      microphone.  This permission allows the app to record audio at any time
      without your confirmation.
android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.label: record audio

android.permission.CAMERA.name: android.permission.CAMERA
android.permission.CAMERA.description:
Allows the app to take pictures and videos
      with the camera.  This permission allows the app to use the camera at any
      time without your confirmation.
android.permission.CAMERA.label: take pictures and videos

android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.name: android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSMIT_LED
android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.description: Allows a pre-installed system application to disable the camera use indicator LED.
android.permission.CAMERA_DISABLE_TRANSM.label: disable transmit indicator LED when camera is in use

android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.name: android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.description:
Allows the app to see the
        number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect
        the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.
android.permission.PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALL.label: reroute outgoing calls

android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.description:
Allows the app to control the
        phone features of the device. An app with this permission can switch
        networks, turn the phone radio on and off and the like without ever notifying
        you.
android.permission.MODIFY_PHONE_STATE.label: modify phone state

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description:
Allows the app to access the phone
      features of the device.  This permission allows the app to determine the
      phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number
      connected by a call.
android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.label: read phone status and identity

android.permission.READ_PRECISE_PHONE_ST.name: android.permission.READ_PRECISE_PHONE_STATE
android.permission.READ_PRECISE_PHONE_ST.description:
Allows the app to access the precise
      phone states.  This permission allows the app to determine the real
      call status, whether a call is active or in the background, call fails,
      precise data connection status and data connection fails.
android.permission.READ_PRECISE_PHONE_ST.label: read precise phone states

android.permission.CALL_PHONE.name: android.permission.CALL_PHONE
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.description:
Allows the app to call phone numbers
      without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls.
      Note that this doesn\'t allow the app to call emergency numbers.
      Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your
      confirmation.
android.permission.CALL_PHONE.label: directly call phone numbers

android.permission.USE_SIP.name: android.permission.USE_SIP
android.permission.USE_SIP.description: Allows the app to make and receive SIP calls.
android.permission.USE_SIP.label: make/receive SIP calls

android.permission.REGISTER_SIM_SUBSCRIP.name: android.permission.REGISTER_SIM_SUBSCRIPTION
android.permission.REGISTER_SIM_SUBSCRIP.description: Allows the app to register new telecom SIM connections.
android.permission.REGISTER_SIM_SUBSCRIP.label: register new telecom SIM connections

android.permission.REGISTER_CALL_PROVIDE.name: android.permission.REGISTER_CALL_PROVIDER
android.permission.REGISTER_CALL_PROVIDE.description: Allows the app to register new telecom connections.

android.permission.REGISTER_CONNECTION_M.name: android.permission.REGISTER_CONNECTION_MANAGER
android.permission.REGISTER_CONNECTION_M.description: Allows the app to manage telecom connections.
android.permission.REGISTER_CONNECTION_M.label: manage telecom connections

android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.description: Allows the app to control when and how the user sees the in-call screen.
android.permission.BIND_INCALL_SERVICE.label: interact with in-call screen

android.permission.BIND_CONNECTION_SERVI.name: android.permission.BIND_CONNECTION_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_CONNECTION_SERVI.description: Allows the app to interact with telephony services to make/receive calls.
android.permission.BIND_CONNECTION_SERVI.label: interact with telephony services

android.permission.CONTROL_INCALL_EXPERI.name: android.permission.CONTROL_INCALL_EXPERIENCE
android.permission.CONTROL_INCALL_EXPERI.description: Allows the app to provide an in-call user experience.
android.permission.CONTROL_INCALL_EXPERI.label: provide an in-call user experience

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.name: android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows the app to read the contents of your SD card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.name: android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE.name: android.permission.WRITE_MEDIA_STORAGE

android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS

android.permission.MANAGE_DOCUMENTS.label: manage document storage

android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.name: android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.description:
Allows the app to disable the
      keylock and any associated password security.  For example, the phone
      disables the keylock when receiving an incoming phone call, then
      re-enables the keylock when the call is finished.
android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD.label: disable your screen lock

android.permission.GET_TASKS.name: android.permission.GET_TASKS
android.permission.GET_TASKS.description:
Allows the app to retrieve information
       about currently and recently running tasks.  This may allow the app to
       discover information about which applications are used on the device.
android.permission.GET_TASKS.label: retrieve running apps

android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS.name: android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS
android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS.description:
Allows the app to retrieve information
       about currently and recently running tasks.  This may allow the app to
       discover information about which applications are used on the device.
android.permission.REAL_GET_TASKS.label: retrieve running apps

android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECE.name: android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECENTS
android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECE.description:
Allows the app to use an ActivityManager.RecentTaskInfo
        object to launch a defunct task that was returned from ActivityManager.getRecentTaskList().
android.permission.START_TASKS_FROM_RECE.label: start a task from recents

android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.description:
Allows the app to perform actions
        across different users on the device.  Malicious apps may use this to violate
        the protection between users.
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.label: interact across users

android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.name: android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS_FULL
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.description:
Allows all possible interactions across
        users.
android.permission.INTERACT_ACROSS_USERS.label: full license to interact across users

android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_USERS
android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.description: Allows apps to manage users on the device, including query, creation and deletion.
android.permission.MANAGE_USERS.label: manage users

android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.name: android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS
android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.description:
Allows the app to retrieve
        detailed information about currently and recently running tasks. Malicious apps may
        discover private information about other apps.
android.permission.GET_DETAILED_TASKS.label: retrieve details of running apps

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.name: android.permission.REORDER_TASKS
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description:
Allows the app to move tasks to the
      foreground and background.  The app may do this without your input.
android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.label: reorder running apps

android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.name: android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.description:
Allows the app to remove
        tasks and kill their apps. Malicious apps may disrupt
        the behavior of other apps.
android.permission.REMOVE_TASKS.label: stop running apps

android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACK.name: android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACKS
android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACK.description:
Allows the app to add, remove, and
        modify the activity stacks in which other apps run.  Malicious apps may disrupt
        the behavior of other apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_ACTIVITY_STACK.label: manage activity stacks

android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY
android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.description: Allows the app to start any activity, regardless of permission protection or exported state.
android.permission.START_ANY_ACTIVITY.label: start any activity

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES
android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.description:
Allows the app to end
      background processes of other apps.  This may cause other apps to stop

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.label: close other apps

android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.name: android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.description:

      background processes of other apps.  This may cause other apps to stop
      running.
android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCE.label: close other apps

android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.name: android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW

        applications or parts of the user interface.  They may interfere with your
        use of the interface in any application, or change what you think you are
        seeing in other applications.
android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW.label: draw over other apps

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.description: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER.label: set wallpaper

android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.name: android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.description: Allows the app to set the system wallpaper size hints.
android.permission.SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS.label: adjust your wallpaper size

android.permission.SET_TIME.name: android.permission.SET_TIME
android.permission.SET_TIME.description: Allows the app to change the phone\'s clock time.
android.permission.SET_TIME.label: set time

android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.name: android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.description: Allows the app to change the phone\'s time zone.
android.permission.SET_TIME_ZONE.label: set time zone

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows the app to expand or collapse the status bar.
android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.label: expand/collapse status bar

com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.name: com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT

com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTAL.name: com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT

        Homescreen shortcuts without user intervention.
com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTAL.label: uninstall shortcuts

android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows the app to read the sync settings for an account. For example, this can determine whether the People app is synced with an account.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: read sync settings

android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.description: Allows an app to modify the sync settings for an account.  For example, this can be used to enable sync of the People app with an account.
android.permission.WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS.label: toggle sync on and off

android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.name: android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.description: Allows an app to read the sync stats for an account, including the history of sync events and how much data is synced.
android.permission.READ_SYNC_STATS.label: read sync statistics

android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.name: android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBILITY
android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.description:

android.permission.SET_SCREEN_COMPATIBIL.label: set screen compatibility

android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.name: android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.description: Allows the app to access external storage for all users.
android.permission.ACCESS_ALL_EXTERNAL_S.label: access external storage of all users

android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.name: android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.description:
Allows the app to
        change the current configuration, such as the locale or overall font
        size.
android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION.label: change system display settings

android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.description:
Allows the app to modify the
        system\'s settings data. Malicious apps may corrupt your system\'s
        configuration.
android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS.label: modify system settings

android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.name: android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.description:
Allows the app to modify the
        Google services map.  Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.WRITE_GSERVICES.label: modify the Google services map

android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.description: Allows the app to forcibly stop other apps.
android.permission.FORCE_STOP_PACKAGES.label: force stop other apps

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTENT

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_CONTE.label: retrieve screen content

android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.name: android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
android.permission.SET_ANIMATION_SCALE.description:

android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY

android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.name: android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.description: Allows the app to retrieve its code, data, and cache sizes
android.permission.GET_PACKAGE_SIZE.label: measure app storage space

android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICA.name: android.permission.SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.name: android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED

android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY
android.permission.BROADCAST_STICKY.description:

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.name: android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS

android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYST.name: android.permission.MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS

android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS.name: android.permission.ASEC_ACCESS

android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.name: android.permission.ASEC_CREATE
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.description: Allows the app to create internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_CREATE.label: create internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.name: android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.description: Allows the app to destroy internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_DESTROY.label: destroy internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.name: android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.description: Allows the app to mount/unmount internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_MOUNT_UNMOUNT.label: mount/unmount internal storage

android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.name: android.permission.ASEC_RENAME
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.description: Allows the app to rename internal storage.
android.permission.ASEC_RENAME.label: rename internal storage

android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.description:

      for example to change the proxy and port of any APN. Malicious apps may monitor, redirect, or modify network
      packets without your knowledge.
android.permission.WRITE_APN_SETTINGS.label: change/intercept network settings and traffic

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.description: Allows the app to get details about the currently synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_READ.label: read subscribed feeds

android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.name: android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRITE
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.description:
Allows the app to modify
      your currently synced feeds. Malicious apps may change your synced feeds.
android.permission.SUBSCRIBED_FEEDS_WRIT.label: write subscribed feeds

android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.name: android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows the app to change the state of network connectivity.

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_CACHE

android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.name: android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_PLAYBACK
android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.description:
Allows the app to use any installed
        media decoder to decode for playback.
android.permission.ALLOW_ANY_CODEC_FOR_P.label: use any media decoder for playback

android.permission.MANAGE_CA_CERTIFICATE.name: android.permission.MANAGE_CA_CERTIFICATES

android.permission.RECOVERY.name: android.permission.RECOVERY

android.permission.RECOVERY.label: Interact with update and recovery system

android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE.description: This permission allows the Android system to run the application in the background when requested.
android.permission.BIND_JOB_SERVICE.label: run the application\'s scheduled background work

android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.name: android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.description:
Allows the app to modify the
        system\'s secure settings data. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS.label: modify secure system settings

android.permission.DUMP.name: android.permission.DUMP
android.permission.DUMP.description:

android.permission.DUMP.label: retrieve system internal state

android.permission.READ_LOGS.name: android.permission.READ_LOGS
android.permission.READ_LOGS.description:
Allows the app to read from the
        system\'s various log files.  This allows it to discover general
        information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially

android.permission.READ_LOGS.label: read sensitive log data

android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.name: android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP
android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.description:

android.permission.SET_DEBUG_APP.label: enable app debugging

android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.name: android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.description:
Allows the app
        to control the maximum number of processes that will run. Never
        needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_PROCESS_LIMIT.label: limit number of running processes

android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.name: android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.description:
Allows the app
        to control whether activities are always finished as soon as they

android.permission.SET_ALWAYS_FINISH.label: force background apps to close

android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.name: android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
android.permission.SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PRO.description:

android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC.name: android.permission.DIAGNOSTIC

android.permission.STATUS_BAR.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.description: Allows the app to disable the status bar or add and remove system icons.
android.permission.STATUS_BAR.label: disable or modify status bar

android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE.name: android.permission.STATUS_BAR_SERVICE

android.permission.FORCE_BACK.name: android.permission.FORCE_BACK

android.permission.FORCE_BACK.label: force app to close

android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.name: android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.description:

        collected battery statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS.label: modify battery statistics

android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.name: android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS
android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.description:
Allows the app to retrieve
        collected application operation statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.GET_APP_OPS_STATS.label: retrieve app ops statistics

android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.name: android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS
android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.description:
Allows the app to modify
        collected application operation statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.UPDATE_APP_OPS_STATS.label: modify app ops statistics

android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.name: android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDOW
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.description:
Allows the app to create
        windows that are intended to be used by the internal system
        user interface. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.INTERNAL_SYSTEM_WINDO.label: display unauthorized windows

android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.description:
Allows the app to
        create and manage their own tokens, bypassing their normal
        Z-ordering. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_APP_TOKENS.label: manage app tokens

android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.name: android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN
android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.description:
Allows the application to temporarily freeze
        the screen for a full-screen transition.
android.permission.FREEZE_SCREEN.label: freeze screen

android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.name: android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.description:
Allows the app to deliver
        its own input events (key presses, etc.) to other apps. Malicious
        apps may use this to take over the phone.
android.permission.INJECT_EVENTS.label: press keys and control buttons

android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.name: android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS
android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.description:
Allows an application to register an input filter
            which filters the stream of all user events before they are dispatched. Malicious app
            may control the system UI whtout user intervention.
android.permission.FILTER_EVENTS.label: filter events

android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_TOKEN.name: android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_TOKEN
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_TOKEN.description:
Allows an application to retrieve
        the window token. Malicious apps may perfrom unauthorized interaction with
        the application window impersonating the system.
android.permission.RETRIEVE_WINDOW_TOKEN.label: retrieve window token

android.permission.FRAME_STATS.name: android.permission.FRAME_STATS
android.permission.FRAME_STATS.description:
Allows an application to collect
        frame statistics. Malicious apps may observe the frame statistics

android.permission.FRAME_STATS.label: retrieve frame statistics

android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.name: android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCESSIBILITY
android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.description:
Allows an application to temporarily
