android.permission.TEMPORARY_ENABLE_ACCE.label: temporary enable accessibility

android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.name: android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.description:
Allows the app to
        monitor and control how the system launches activities.
        Malicious apps may completely compromise the system. This
        permission is only needed for development, never for normal
        use.
android.permission.SET_ACTIVITY_WATCHER.label: monitor and control all app launching

android.permission.SHUTDOWN.name: android.permission.SHUTDOWN
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.description:
Puts the activity manager into a shutdown
        state.  Does not perform a complete shutdown.
android.permission.SHUTDOWN.label: partial shutdown

android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.name: android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.description:
Prevents the user from switching to
        another app.
android.permission.STOP_APP_SWITCHES.label: prevent app switches

android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.name: android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO
android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.description:
Allows the holder to retrieve private information
        about the current application in the foreground of the screen.
android.permission.GET_TOP_ACTIVITY_INFO.label: get current app info

android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.name: android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.description:
Allows the app to watch the
        keys you press even when interacting with another app (such
        as typing a password). Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.READ_INPUT_STATE.label: record what you type and actions you take

android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.name: android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of an input method. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_INPUT_METHOD.label: bind to an input method

android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.name: android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of an accessibility service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SE.label: bind to an accessibility service

android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a print service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SERVICE.label: bind to a print service

android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to applications
        that are emulating NFC cards. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_NFC_SERVICE.label: bind to NFC service

android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SE.name: android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a print spooler service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_PRINT_SPOOLER_SE.label: bind to a print spooler service

android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a text service(e.g. SpellCheckerService). Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_TEXT_SERVICE.label: bind to a text service

android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a Vpn service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_VPN_SERVICE.label: bind to a VPN service

android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.name: android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a wallpaper. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_WALLPAPER.label: bind to a wallpaper

android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTIO.name: android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION
android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTIO.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a voice interaction service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_VOICE_INTERACTIO.label: bind to a voice interactor

android.permission.MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRAS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRASES
android.permission.MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRAS.description:
Allows the holder to manage the keyphrases for voice hotword detection.
        Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_VOICE_KEYPHRAS.label: manage voice keyphrases

android.permission.BIND_REMOTE_DISPLAY.name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTE_DISPLAY
android.permission.BIND_REMOTE_DISPLAY.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a remote display. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_REMOTE_DISPLAY.label: bind to a remote display

android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT.name: android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT
android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a TV input. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_TV_INPUT.label: bind to a TV input

android.permission.MODIFY_PARENTAL_CONTR.name: android.permission.MODIFY_PARENTAL_CONTROLS
android.permission.MODIFY_PARENTAL_CONTR.description:
Allows the holder to modify the system\'s
        parental controls data. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.MODIFY_PARENTAL_CONTR.label: modify parental controls

android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.name: android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.description:
Allows the holder to send intents to
        a device administrator. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN.label: interact with a device admin

android.permission.MANAGE_DEVICE_ADMINS.name: android.permission.MANAGE_DEVICE_ADMINS
android.permission.MANAGE_DEVICE_ADMINS.description:
Allows the holder to add or remove active device
        administrators. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_DEVICE_ADMINS.label: add or remove a device admin

android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.name: android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.description:
Allows the app to change
        the rotation of the screen at any time. Should never be needed for
        normal apps.
android.permission.SET_ORIENTATION.label: change screen orientation

android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.name: android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.description:
Allows the app to change
        the mouse or trackpad pointer speed at any time. Should never be needed for
        normal apps.
android.permission.SET_POINTER_SPEED.label: change pointer speed

android.permission.SET_INPUT_CALIBRATION.name: android.permission.SET_INPUT_CALIBRATION
android.permission.SET_INPUT_CALIBRATION.description: Allows the app to modify the calibration parameters of the touch screen. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_INPUT_CALIBRATION.label: change input device calibration

android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.name: android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT
android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.description:
Allows the app to change
        the keyboard layout. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.SET_KEYBOARD_LAYOUT.label: change keyboard layout

android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.description:
Allows the app to install new or updated
        Android packages. Malicious apps may use this to add new apps with arbitrarily
        powerful permissions.
android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES.label: directly install apps

android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.name: android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.description: Allows the app to clear user data.
android.permission.CLEAR_APP_USER_DATA.label: delete other apps\' data

android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.name: android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.description:
Allows the app to delete
        cache files.
android.permission.DELETE_CACHE_FILES.label: delete other apps\' caches

android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.name: android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.description:
Allows the app to delete
        Android packages. Malicious apps may use this to delete important apps.
android.permission.DELETE_PACKAGES.label: delete apps

android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.name: android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.description: Allows the app to move app resources from internal to external media and vice versa.
android.permission.MOVE_PACKAGE.label: move app resources

android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.name: android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.description:
Allows the app to change whether a
        component of another app is enabled or not. Malicious apps may use this
        to disable important phone capabilities. Care must be used with this permission, as it is
        possible to get app components into an unusable, inconsistent, or unstable state.
android.permission.CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENAB.label: enable or disable app components

android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.name: android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSIONS
android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.description:
Allows an application to grant or revoke
        specific permissions for it or other applications.  Malicious applications may use this
        to access features you have not granted them.
android.permission.GRANT_REVOKE_PERMISSI.label: grant or revoke permissions

android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.name: android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGER
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.description: Allows the app to use SurfaceFlinger low-level features.
android.permission.ACCESS_SURFACE_FLINGE.label: access SurfaceFlinger

android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.name: android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.description: Allows the app to read the content of the frame buffer.
android.permission.READ_FRAME_BUFFER.label: read frame buffer

android.permission.ACCESS_INPUT_FLINGER.name: android.permission.ACCESS_INPUT_FLINGER
android.permission.ACCESS_INPUT_FLINGER.description: Allows the app to use InputFlinger low-level features.
android.permission.ACCESS_INPUT_FLINGER.label: access InputFlinger

android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.name: android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLAY
android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.description: Allows the app to configure and connect to Wifi displays.
android.permission.CONFIGURE_WIFI_DISPLA.label: configure Wifi displays

android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.name: android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY
android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.description: Allows the app to control low-level features of Wifi displays.
android.permission.CONTROL_WIFI_DISPLAY.label: control Wifi displays

android.permission.CONTROL_VPN.name: android.permission.CONTROL_VPN
android.permission.CONTROL_VPN.description: Allows the app to control low-level features of Virtual Private Networks.
android.permission.CONTROL_VPN.label: control Virtual Private Networks

android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT
android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.description: Allows the app to capture and redirect audio output.
android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT.label: capture audio output

android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD.name: android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD
android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD.description:
Allows the app to capture audio for Hotword detection. The capture can
      happen in the background but does not prevent other audio capture (e.g. Camcorder).
android.permission.CAPTURE_AUDIO_HOTWORD.label: Hotword detection

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_ROUTING.name: android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_ROUTING
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_ROUTING.description:
Allows the app to directly control audio routing and
      override audio policy decisions.
android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_ROUTING.label: Audio Routing

android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.name: android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.description: Allows the app to capture and redirect video output.
android.permission.CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT.label: capture video output

android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_.name: android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_.description: Allows the app to capture and redirect secure video output.
android.permission.CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_.label: capture secure video output

android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.name: android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL
android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.description: Allows the app to control media playback and access the media information (title, author...).
android.permission.MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL.label: control media playback and metadata access

android.permission.BRICK.name: android.permission.BRICK
android.permission.BRICK.description:
Allows the app to
        disable the entire phone permanently. This is very dangerous.
android.permission.BRICK.label: permanently disable phone

android.permission.REBOOT.name: android.permission.REBOOT
android.permission.REBOOT.description: Allows the app to force the phone to reboot.
android.permission.REBOOT.label: force phone reboot

android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.name: android.permission.DEVICE_POWER
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.description: Allows the app to turn the phone on or off.
android.permission.DEVICE_POWER.label: power phone on or off

android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY.name: android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY
android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY.description: Allows the app to reset the display timeout.
android.permission.USER_ACTIVITY.label: reset display timeout

android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.name: android.permission.FACTORY_TEST
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.description:
Run as a low-level manufacturer test,
        allowing complete access to the phone hardware. Only available
        when a phone is running in manufacturer test mode.
android.permission.FACTORY_TEST.label: run in factory test mode

android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.description:
Allows the app to
        broadcast a notification that an app package has been removed.
        Malicious apps may use this to kill any other running
        app.
android.permission.BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REM.label: send package removed broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.description:
Allows the app to
        broadcast a notification that an SMS message has been received.
        Malicious apps may use this to forge incoming SMS messages.
android.permission.BROADCAST_SMS.label: send SMS-received broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.description:
Allows the app to
        broadcast a notification that a WAP PUSH message has been received.
        Malicious apps may use this to forge MMS message receipt or to
        silently replace the content of any webpage with malicious variants.
android.permission.BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH.label: send WAP-PUSH-received broadcast

android.permission.BROADCAST_NETWORK_PRI.name: android.permission.BROADCAST_NETWORK_PRIVILEGED
android.permission.BROADCAST_NETWORK_PRI.description:
Allows the app
        to send privileged network broadcasts.
        Never needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BROADCAST_NETWORK_PRI.label: send privileged network broadcasts

android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.name: android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.description:
Allows the app to completely
        reset the system to its factory settings, erasing all data,
        configuration, and installed apps.
android.permission.MASTER_CLEAR.label: reset system to factory defaults

android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.name: android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.description:
Allows the app to call
        any phone number, including emergency numbers, without your intervention.
        Malicious apps may place unnecessary and illegal calls to emergency
        services.
android.permission.CALL_PRIVILEGED.label: directly call any phone numbers

android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.name: android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIONING
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.description:
Allows the app to start CDMA provisioning.
        Malicious apps may unnecessarily start CDMA provisioning.
android.permission.PERFORM_CDMA_PROVISIO.label: directly start CDMA phone setup

android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.name: android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.description:
Allows the app to enable/disable location
        update notifications from the radio.  Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDA.label: control location update notifications

android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.description:
Allows the app read/write access to
        properties uploaded by the checkin service.  Not for use by normal
        apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPER.label: access checkin properties

android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.description: Allows the app to modify collected component usage statistics. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS.label: update component usage statistics

android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.name: android.permission.BATTERY_STATS
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.description:
Allows an application to read the current low-level
        battery use data.  May allow the application to find out detailed information about
        which apps you use.
android.permission.BATTERY_STATS.label: read battery statistics

android.permission.BACKUP.name: android.permission.BACKUP
android.permission.BACKUP.description: Allows the app to control the system\'s backup and restore mechanism.  Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.BACKUP.label: control system backup and restore

android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.name: android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.description: Allows the app to launch the full backup confirmation UI.  Not to be used by any app.
android.permission.CONFIRM_FULL_BACKUP.label: confirm a full backup or restore operation

android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.name: android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.description:
Allows the holder to bind to the top-level
        interface of a widget service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_REMOTEVIEWS.label: bind to a widget service

android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.name: android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.description:
Allows the app to tell the system
        which widgets can be used by which app. An app with this permission
        can give access to personal data to other apps.
        Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_APPWIDGET.label: choose widgets

android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.name: android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DATA_SETTING
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.description: Allows the app to change the background data usage setting.
android.permission.CHANGE_BACKGROUND_DAT.label: change background data usage setting

android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYSTEM
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.description: Allows the app to read and write the cache filesystem.
android.permission.ACCESS_CACHE_FILESYST.label: access the cache filesystem

android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.name: android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HISTORY
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.description: Allows the app to read historical network usage for specific networks and apps.
android.permission.READ_NETWORK_USAGE_HI.label: read historical network usage

android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.name: android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.description: Allows the app to manage network policies and define app-specific rules.
android.permission.MANAGE_NETWORK_POLICY.label: manage network policy

android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.name: android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUNTING
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.description: Allows the app to modify how network usage is accounted against apps. Not for use by normal apps.
android.permission.MODIFY_NETWORK_ACCOUN.label: modify network usage accounting

android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.name: android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_AGENT
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.description:
Allows the app to verify a package is
        installable.
android.permission.PACKAGE_VERIFICATION_.label: verify packages

android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.name: android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.description:
Allows the holder to make requests of
        package verifiers. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_PACKAGE_VERIFIER.label: bind to a package verifier

android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.name: android.permission.SERIAL_PORT
android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.description: Allows the holder to access serial ports using the SerialManager API.
android.permission.SERIAL_PORT.label: access serial ports

android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.name: android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVIDERS_EXTERNALLY
android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.description:
Allows the holder to access content
     providers from the shell. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_CONTENT_PROVID.label: access content providers externally

android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.name: android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK
android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.description: Allows the holder to offer information to the system about when would be a good time for a noninteractive reboot to upgrade the device.
android.permission.UPDATE_LOCK.label: discourage automatic device updates

android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS
android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Allows the app to retrieve, examine, and clear notifications, including those posted by other apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_NOTIFICATIONS.label: access notifications

android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECUR.name: android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECURE_STORAGE
android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECUR.description: Allows an application to access keguard secure storage.
android.permission.ACCESS_KEYGUARD_SECUR.label: Access keyguard secure storage

android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD.name: android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD
android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD.description: Allows an application to control keguard.
android.permission.CONTROL_KEYGUARD.label: Control displaying and hiding keyguard

android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER.name: android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER
android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER.description: Allows an application to listen for changes in trust state.
android.permission.TRUST_LISTENER.label: Listen to trust state changes.

android.permission.PROVIDE_TRUST_AGENT.name: android.permission.PROVIDE_TRUST_AGENT
android.permission.PROVIDE_TRUST_AGENT.description: Allows an application to provide a trust agent.
android.permission.PROVIDE_TRUST_AGENT.label: Provide a trust agent.

android.permission.LAUNCH_TRUST_AGENT_SE.name: android.permission.LAUNCH_TRUST_AGENT_SETTINGS
android.permission.LAUNCH_TRUST_AGENT_SE.description: Allows an application to launch an activity that changes the trust agent behavior.
android.permission.LAUNCH_TRUST_AGENT_SE.label: Launch trust agent settings menu.

android.permission.BIND_TRUST_AGENT.name: android.permission.BIND_TRUST_AGENT
android.permission.BIND_TRUST_AGENT.description: Allows an application to bind to a trust agent service.
android.permission.BIND_TRUST_AGENT.label: Bind to a trust agent service

android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.name: android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a notification listener service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_NOTIFICATION_LIS.label: bind to a notification listener service

android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVID.name: android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVIDER_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVID.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a condition provider service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_CONDITION_PROVID.label: bind to a condition provider service

android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.name: android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a dream service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_DREAM_SERVICE.label: bind to a dream service

android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP.name: android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP
android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP.description: Allows the holder to invoke the carrier-provided configuration app. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.INVOKE_CARRIER_SETUP.label: invoke the carrier-provided configuration app

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDIT.name: android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDITIONS
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDIT.description: Allows an application to listen for observations on network conditions. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_CONDIT.label: listen for observations on network conditions

android.permission.ACCESS_DRM_CERTIFICAT.name: android.permission.ACCESS_DRM_CERTIFICATES
android.permission.ACCESS_DRM_CERTIFICAT.description: Allows an application to provision and use DRM certficates. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.ACCESS_DRM_CERTIFICAT.label: access DRM certificates

android.permission.MANAGE_MEDIA_PROJECTI.name: android.permission.MANAGE_MEDIA_PROJECTION
android.permission.MANAGE_MEDIA_PROJECTI.description: Allows an application to manage media projection sessions. These sessions can provide applications the ability to capture display and audio contents. Should never be needed by normal apps.
android.permission.MANAGE_MEDIA_PROJECTI.label: Manage media projection sessions

android.permission.READ_INSTALL_SESSIONS.name: android.permission.READ_INSTALL_SESSIONS
android.permission.READ_INSTALL_SESSIONS.description: Allows an application to read install sessions. This allows it to see details about active package installations.
android.permission.READ_INSTALL_SESSIONS.label: Read install sessions

android.permission.REMOVE_DRM_CERTIFICAT.name: android.permission.REMOVE_DRM_CERTIFICATES
android.permission.REMOVE_DRM_CERTIFICAT.description: Allows an application to remove DRM certficates. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.REMOVE_DRM_CERTIFICAT.label: remove DRM certificates

android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGIN.name: android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE
android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGIN.description: Allows the holder to bind to the top-level interface of a carrier messaging service. Should never be needed for normal apps.
android.permission.BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGIN.label: bind to a carrier messaging service
